elements.text: Hi I am looking for experienced Product Designers and Marketers (at least 7 years of experience) to feature on our micro consulting platform

. We already have over 120 high profile experts (many have fortune 500 experience, including Facebook, Google, Apple, etc.) to answer micro consulting questions.

There are 3 ways to monetize on Wizly as an expert:
When users schedule a micro consulting session with you;
When you produce content or hold a webinar for us.
If you believe you are a good fit, please DM me your LinkedIn profile URL.

text:
Hello, Everyone!

NimbleEdge is looking for two (technical) content writer Interns. 

NimbleEdge is leading the movement towards true edge computing, building a new era of technology that alters the status quo between the cloud and the users' devices. NimbleEdge provides hyper-personalized AI without any data leaving the device. A technology that is inherently privacy-preserving. Our core mission is to educate and raise awareness of edge computing and the benefits of the edge in terms of privacy, security, and app performance.

This might be a fantastic opportunity for someone who enjoys writing and has familiarity with data science or edge computing. Knowledge of SEO and keyword research is a bonus, but not needed. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have a strong desire to write and learn. 

As an intern, you will have the opportunity to demonstrate your abilities, make substantial contributions, network, earn swag, and, most importantly, be considered for full-time employment. 

Fill out this form if interested : <https://forms.gle/UamdCXji9j21Bwbh8|https://forms.gle/UamdCXji9j21Bwbh8>

For any questions, feel free to DM me or join the Discord channel (<https://discord.gg/ZbdE4Gvm|https://discord.gg/ZbdE4Gvm>) and ask in the community.

text: I've been successfully freelancing for about 10 years. Niching down on the type of content (I focus on long form such as white papers and ebooks) and niching down on who you serve (certain industry) are keys to standing out and getting clients. LI has also been great  place to both connect with my ideal clients and have prospects reach out to me, as well as just meet a lot of great people to have in my network.
